attributes.action: Stop the redevelopment of Whiteley Village in Hampshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to stop any more redevelopment of Whiteley village in Hampshire. The outlet village has only been built for 10 years and now winchester council deem it suitable for demolition! Why does Whiteley need another hotel, social housing and a bigger supermarket? Why? The road system is not able to tolerated further traffic in the area. You need to stop this stupid re-development NOW, the current shops are more than suitable for new business to grow only we need the correct type of facilities here.
